items.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation engine that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 personalized product suggestions on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on recent user activity.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to non-personalized suggestions.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data availability
non_functional: System supports at least 10,000 concurrent recommendation requests
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: User input was high-level; assumed core requirement is to integrate AI-based personalization into an e-commerce platform. Specifics like algorithms, UI placement, and evaluation metrics were inferred.
